author: Not available

text.12: ða aras mænig goldhladen ðegn,      gyrde hine his swurde.
text.13: ða to dura eodon      drihtlice cempan,
text.14: Sigeferð and Eaha,      hyra sword getugon,
text.15: and æt oþrum durum      Ordlaf and Guþlaf,
text.16: and Hengest sylf      hwearf him on laste.
text.18: ðæt he swa freolic feorh      forman siþe
text.19: to ðære healle durum      hyrsta ne bære,
text.2: "Ne ðis ne dagað eastan,      ne her draca ne fleogeð,
text.20: nu hyt niþa heard      anyman wolde,
text.21: ac he frægn ofer eal      undearninga,
text.22: deormod hæleþ,      hwa ða duru heolde.
text.23: "Sigeferþ is min nama," cweþ he,      "ic eom Secgena leod,
text.25: heardra hilda.      ðe is gyt her witod
text.26: swæþer ðu sylf to me      secean wylle."
text.27: ða wæs on healle      wælslihta gehlyn;
text.3: ne her ðisse healle      hornas ne byrnað.
text.30: oð æt ðære guðe      Garulf gecrang,
text.32: Guðlafes sunu,      ymbe hyne godra fæla,
text.36: Ne gefrægn ic næfre wurþlicor      æt wera hilde
text.4: Ac her forþ berað;      fugelas singað,
text.40: Hig fuhton fif dagas,      swa hyra nan ne feol
text.41: drihtgesiða,      ac hig ða duru heoldon.
text.42: ða gewat him wund hæleð      on wæg gangan,
text.43: sæde þæt his byrne      abrocen wære,
text.44: heresceorp unhror,      and eac wæs his helm ðyrel.
text.45: ða hine sona frægn      folces hyrde,
text.46: hu ða wigend hyra      wunda genæson,
text.6: scyld scefte oncwyð.      Nu scyneð þes mona
text.7: waðol under wolcnum.      Nu arisað weadæda
text.8: ðe ðisne folces nið      fremman willað.

source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry
